action.action-desc: Mrs. Cherfilus-McCormick (for herself and Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to codify the requirements for appointment, qualifications, and pay for therapeutic medical physicists of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act.

section.header: Treatment of therapeutic medical physicists of the Department of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Section 7401(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting therapeutic medical physicists, after physician assistants,.
Section 7402(b) of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraph (14) as paragraph (15); and
by inserting after paragraph (13) the following new paragraph (14):
To be eligible to be appointed to a therapeutic medical physicist position, a person must—

subparagraph.text: have completed a post-graduate clinical training program in therapeutic medical physics satisfactory to the Secretary; and
be board certified in the field of therapeutic medical physics by a certifying body approved by the Secretary.

subsection.text: Section 7404 of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting therapeutic medical physicist, after podiatrist (dpm),; and
by inserting after Podiatrist grade. the following:

subsection.text: Section 7421(b) of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraph (9) as paragraph (10); and
by inserting, after paragraph (8), the following new paragraph (9):
Section 7431 of such title is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting , Therapeutic Medical Physicist before , and Dentist Base each place it appears;
by inserting therapeutic medical physicist, after podiatrist, each place it appears;
by inserting therapeutic medical physicists, after podiatrists, each place it appears; and
in subsection (e)(1)(A), by inserting , therapeutic medical physicists, after podiatrists.

paragraph.text: Section 7433 of such title is amended by inserting therapeutic medical physicists, after podiatrists, each place it appears.
The heading of subchapter III of chapter 74 of such title is amended by inserting Therapeutic Medical Physicists, after Podiatrists,.
The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 74 of such title is amended by striking the item relating to subchapter III and inserting the following new item:

toc.toc-entry: Subchapter III—Pay for Physicians, Podiatrists, Therapeutic Medical Physicists, and Dentists

subsection.text: Not later than one year after the date of enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall submit to the Committees on Veterans’ Affairs of the Senate and House of Representatives a report on the amendments made by this section. Such report shall include the following:

paragraph.text: The effects of an increase in pay for therapeutic medical physicists employed on a full-time basis within the Department of Veterans Affairs.
The effects on therapeutic medical physicists who provide care pursuant to an agreement with the Secretary.
Any change to costs to the Department.
